reporter_caption.center: CORREIA v. DEPARTMENT OF EMPLOYMENT SECURITY, 424 A.2d 241 (R.I. 1980)

caption.center: James E. CORREIA, Jr. v. DEPARTMENT OF EMPLOYMENT SECURITY.

opinion.attorneys:
Lovett Linder, Ltd., Lauren E. Jones, Providence, for plaintiff.
Charles H. McLaughlin, Providence, for defendant.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] ORDER [2] This matter is before the court on an order directing the plaintiff to show cause why his appeal should not be dismissed since the trial justice apparently did not abuse his discretion in awarding a counsel fee. No cause having been shown to us, we hereby dismiss the appeal.
